panels.visual: Wide establishing shot of the Undercroft dance hall beneath Eys√Ωsla. Ancient stone vaults rise into shadow. Candles flicker on every surface. A crowd of young men and women dance and drink, their bodies moving to drums and flutes. The dance floor is worn smooth by centuries of feet. Multiple levels are visible, with staircases leading down into deeper darkness.
panels.narration: They danced five nights each week in the Undercroft. A wedding feast on Wednesday, raiders returning triumphant on Thursday, jigs and reels on Fridays.

panels.visual: Anna sits in a fine chair like a jarl's wife upon a throne. Short braids frame her sharp Nordic features. She wears a white blouse with chalk-stripe vest. Her eyes survey the dance floor with ancient authority despite her nineteen winters. She holds a bottle of wine, gazing through it at the world below.
panels.narration: Anna sits drinking wine in the finest chair. Like a jarl's wife upon a throne.

panels.visual: The girls cluster around Anna, whispering and pointing toward a tall figure in the crowd below. Kari's eyes are fixed on her target - 'Meat' - a towering young man with pale blue eyes and shaggy dark hair. Sofie stands apart, watching everything with a guardian's vigilance.
panels.dialogue: Kari: "He will suffice for now. Let us go in."
